Trigger.name: line (ground)
Trigger.script:
groundMapCount = groundMapCount + 1
if groundMapCount == 1 then sym.ui.mapper:decho('Ground', '
 <0,128,128>Room: <128,128,0>' .. gmcp.Room.Info.name .. '') sym.ui.mapper:decho('Ground', '
 <0,128,128>Area: <128,128,0>' .. gmcp.Room.Info.area .. '') sym.ui.mapper:decho('Ground', '
 <0,128,128>Environment: <128,128,0>' .. gmcp.Room.Info.environment .. '') sym.ui.mapper:decho('Ground', '
 <0,128,128>Coords: <128,128,0>' .. gmcp.Room.Info.num .. '') sym.ui.mapper:decho('Ground', '
 <0,128,128>Exits: <128,128,0>' .. table.concat(table.keys(gmcp.Room.Info.exits), ' ') .. '
') sym.ui.mapper:decho('Ground', '
<0,0,128>' .. string.rep('-', 45)) end
if groundMapCount > 1 and groundMapCount < 25 then sym.ui.mapper:append('Ground') else deleteLine() end
if groundMapCount == 25 then sym.ui.mapper:decho('Ground', '<0,0,128>' .. string.rep('-', 45)) end

Trigger.name: space prompt
Trigger.script: local speed, hull, shield, cap = multimatches[2][2], multimatches[2][3], multimatches[2][4], multimatches[2][5] local vitals = gmcp.Char.Vitals local shields_perc = round(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_shield / gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_shield_max * 100) local hull_perc = round(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_hull / gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_hull_max * 100) local function getSystemColour(amount) amount = tonumber(amount) if amount >= 92.5 then return '<255,255,255:0,0,0>' elseif amount >= 70 then return '<255,255,0:0,0,0>' elseif amount >= 30 then return '<255,150,20:0,0,0>' else return '<200,0,0:0,0,0>' end end deleteLine() moveCursorEnd('mapwinSpace') selectCurrentLine('mapwinSpace') replace('mapwinSpace','') sym.ui.mapper:decho( 'Space', string.format( '<192,192,192:0,0,0>Spd:%3s<250,250,250:0,0,0> <230,180,20:0,0,0>Hull:'..getSystemColour(hull_perc)..'%3s<250,250,250:0,0,0> <60,160,255:0,0,0>Shld:'..getSystemColour(shields_perc)..'%3s<250,250,250:0,0,0><215,60,170:0,0,0> Cap:<192,192,192:0,0,0>%3s%%', vitals.ship_speed, vitals.ship_hull, vitals.ship_shield, cap ) )

Trigger.name: capture map (hacking)
Trigger.script:
if hackclear then
clearUserWindow("mapwinHacking") sym.ui.mapper.switch('Hacking')
hackclear = false
end
selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("mapwinHacking") deleteLine()

Trigger.name: capture map (space)
Trigger.script: selectString(line,1) local r, g, b = getFgColor() if r == 192 and g == 192 and b == 192 then clearWindow('mapwinSpace') sym.ui.mapper:decho('Space', '\n') sym.ui.mapper:decho('Space', '\n') enableTrigger('line (capture)') capturing = 'space' end

regexCodeList.string: Detected an
Beacon at

Trigger.name: beacon capture
Trigger.script:
local distance = tonumber(matches[2]) local dir = matches[3] local zone = matches[4] local x = tonumber(matches[5]) local y = tonumber(matches[6]) local desc = matches[7] local color = "#00ff00"
if string.match(desc, "mineable") or string.match(desc, "harvestable") then color = "#ffff99" elseif string.match(desc, "Planet") or string.match(desc, "Satellite") or string.match(desc, "Sun") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid CS") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid RS") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid CA") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid RA") or string.match(desc,"Asteroid VAI") then color = "#e0e0e0" elseif string.match(desc, "station") or string.match(desc, "voidgate") then color = "#ffb266" elseif string.find(desc, "#%d+") then if not string.match(desc, "structure") then
local targetID = string.sub(string.match(desc, "#%d+"), 2)
if string.match(desc, "from Song") then color = "#ff33ff" elseif string.match(desc, "from Scat") then color = "#cc6600" elseif string.match(desc, "from Cele") then color = "#0080ff" else table.insert(ship_targets, ship_id) if ship_id == sym.target then desc = ">> "..desc end end
end end moveCursor('beacon', 0, 0) hinsertText('beacon', color..' '..distance.." "..dir.."\t"..desc.."\n")

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()
You disembark from the ship.
Your vision comes back into focus as your consciousness returns to your physical body.
You embark the ship.
You enter the commsphere.

Trigger.name: settings
Trigger.script:
tempTimer( 3, function() cechoLink('
<yellow> Nighstalker requires showing balance to be enabled. Click here to do so!', [[send('config showbalance on')]],'config showbalance on', true) cechoLink('
<yellow> Nighstalker requires somekind of combat messages on. Click here to do so!', [[send('config combatmessages full')]],'config combatmessages full', true) cechoLink('
<yellow> Nighstalker requires ground map to be shown. Click here to do so!', [[sendAll('config mapshow on', 'map radius 5')]],'config mapshow on', true) cechoLink('
<yellow> Nighstalker recommends MXP. Click here to do so!', [[send('config mxp on')]],'config mxp on', true) cechoLink('
<yellow> Nighstalker recommends balance queueing. Click here to do so!', [[send('config usequeueing on')]],'config usequeueing on', true) cechoLink('
<yellow> Nighstalker recommends allowing the client to wrap text. Click here to do so!', [[send('config wrapwidth 0')]],'config wrapwidth 0', true) sym.hunter.triggy(gmcp.Char.Status.class) sym.pvp.triggy(gmcp.Char.Status.class) end )

regexCodeList.string: .+ your .+ has reached (.+)\% health\.
^Throwing back its grizzled head\, .+ lets out a high-pitched\, wavering howl\.$
^With an aggressive snarl\, .+ scampers right for .+\, its needlelike little fingers extended\.$
^.+ draws in a deep breath\, its sides beginning to swell alarmingly\.$
^.+ hauls its body high and it looms above .+\, moments from a terrible\, crushing crash\.$
^.+ shoots its trunk outwards and wraps it around .+\, beginning to tighten it slowly in a crushing grip\.$
^A low hum begins to whine from the blaster in .+ hand\, red lights along the barrel growing brighter and brighter\.$
^The LED lights glittering in the robotic stems of .+ begin to flash a dull but penetrating red\, and the fleshy blossom pulses urgently\.$
^.+ begins to rattle\, steam pouring from its body as the meters and dials on its mechanical body glow bright red\.$
^A high-pitched whistle of steam screams from .+\, and it begins to spin in a rapid circle\, firing bolts and scrap metal in every direction\.$
^Curling in on herself\, Tsake Shayato begins to shake rapidly\, rocking back and forth in a ball of pent up rage and aggression\.$
^Light begins to focus deep within the body of .+\, growing to an almost painful radiance\.$
^Staggering backwards\, shoulder joint grinding\, .+ draws back one of its massive\, stony limbs\, preparing to swing it\.$
^.+ grows still and concentrates on something while glaring at .+\.$
^.+ begins to glow with an ominous red light\, and a faint humming noise begins to sound deep within it\.
^Rearing back on its powerful hind legs and muscular\, prehensile tail\, the moss lizard coils itself tight\, ready tospring\.
^Spinning swiftly, .+ winds up its tail to whip it towards .+ at astonishing speeds\.
^Reeling backwards\, .+ shoulders begin to lurch and heave in an alarming way\, an incipient rumble gurgling up from its bloated midsection\.
^Bracing itself against the floor on four spindly legs\, .+ arches its back as it starts to make a convulsive series of loud braying retches\, saliva dripping between its tongues\.
^Bunching itself sinuously backwards for a moment\, .+ begins to make rhythmic lurching movements and deep\, glottal gagging noises\, weirdly not unlike a cat that is about to vomit\.
^A disturbingly enraged\, high pitched whine screeches loudly from a horned lapine\, and it begins to thrash at the earth with its powerful back legs\.
^Rearing back on its powerful hind legs and muscular\, prehensile tail\, the moss lizard coils itself tight\, ready to spring\.
^Aggressive and swift\, .+ lunges towards .+ with a wide-open mouth\, ready to bite down - hard\.
^.+ cocks a leg and draws it back\, ready to kick it powerfully at .+\.
^.+ scuttles a little ways away and extends its ovipositor\, beginning to expel a fleshy series of softball-sized white eggs\.
^.+ paws at the ground and lowers its head, preparing to charge at .+\.
^.+ around you\, beginning to tighten and strangle\.
^Venom sacs at the base of .+ stinger begin to pulse, signaling a .+ attack\.
^A low growl rumbles from .+\, and it wiggles its hindquarters\, about to pounce at .+\.
^.+ abruptly goes still\, an ominous buzzing sound beginning to whirr beneath its thick carapace\.
^Flying high\, .+ folds its wings and plunges downward\, hurtling directly towards you\.
^Opening its pincers wide\, .+ rears back on its four back legs\, preparing to attack .+\.
^.+ rolls and rumbles rockily across the ground\, aiming to collide with .+\.
^.+ buzzes loudly and then divebombs .+\, stinger-end first\.
^Tentacles from the bottom of .+ body drift ominously towards you\.
^.+ begins to open\, preparing to close around .+\.
^Vibrating a little\, .+ begins to glow brightly\, sparks dancing from its fur\.
^.+ a leg and draws it back\, ready to kick it powerfully at .+\.
^A strange\, odorless vapor begins to drift from the body of .+\, spreading out across the area\.
^Surrounding .+ in the coils of its body\, .+ begins to squeeze with bone-crushing force\.
^The rotors on .+ begin to whir faster and faster\, until they are blurry with dangerous speed\.
^Threshing through the ground\, .+ directly towards .+\, claws extended\.
^Tiny particles within .+ link themselves together to form molecule-thin chains of deadly razors\. Ominously\, thecloud begins to spin\.
^.+ paws at the ground and lowers its head\, preparing to charge at .+\.
^Moving backwards for a moment\, .+ begins to prepare a syringe that .+ pulls from a fleshy fold of .+ body\.
^.+ gathers its many legs beneath it and arcs its dripping stinger overhead\, preparing to attack with vicious speed\.
^Lifting its huge body up into the air\, .+ rears back in preparation\, acid dripping from its mandibles\.
A volatile anomaly's otherworldly, thrumming hum grows all-consuming and it presses on relentlessly, its center crackling with dark energy.
An out-of-control FeTek assembly drone's curved beak begins to bob up and down erratically, the welding attachment beginning to glow even brighter.
^.+ hauls its body high and it looms above you\, moments from a terrible\, crushing crash\.$
A Vihana void crawler's chitin begins to shake, the plates vibrating against one another at a frequency that causes your head to ache as the vibrations sink into your core.
^.+ writhes through the air and coils its body around you\, beginning to tighten and strangle\.$
^Rearing back, every one of .+ limbs coils backwards on itself into a tight spiral\, oozing with glowing green fluid that begins to drip\.$
^The thrashing root of .+ seems to stretch out into a weird pink rope\, coiling its sinuous girth firmly around .+ nearest limb\.$
^.+ shudders violently, its amber eyes brightening with an electrical surge.
^A bubble of light begins to form at the tip of a rogue mining drone's laser\.$
You overdrive your suit's movement circuits
You activate your suit's emergency life support system
Your HUD indicates that you may use your life support system once again.
You activate the contingency module in
You are already prepared to fire the jumpjets when in
You trigger your B
Without warning, you snatch
piece from your belt and fire it from the hip
^You: Gun Ambush .+\.$
^.+ calmly dodges the predictable attack\.$
You are again ready to ambush.
Placing your hand on the hammer of
you quickly fire off two shots
^You: Gun Rapidfire .+\.
You are again ready to dualshoot.
You jam a stim into your vein and healing nanites surge through your body.
You: Guile Stim.
You can again use a stim.
You have no such explosive device in your inventory.
^You\: Gun Eject\.$
^You can once again drop an unspent magazine\.$
You focus intently to direct a portion of your swarm towards
You: Nanotech Multistrike

Trigger.name: nanites return
Trigger.script:
sym.hunter.flags.multistrike = false
selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0,170,255) resetFormat() deselect()

regexCodeList.string: The group of nanites returns back to you.
The nanites disperse, no longer striking at
You brush your fingertips across
You: Void Freeze
You point your finger at
^(.+) has cured the effects of Frozen\.$
A dark wave of madness rolls through your thoughts, and an impossibly vast mind seems to descend over your own, the Conquerer arriving to drive you into a dangerous frenzy.
You: Oblivion Frenzy.
You have already descended into a frenzy
You break out of your frenzy.
You can again whip yourself into a frenzy.
You: Voidism Embrace.
Drawing a deep breath, you embrace the darkness
You can once again embrace the surrounding energies.
Inhaling a cloud of your swarm, you enable a wetwiring augmentation subroutine. Your muscles tighten, adrenaline pouring through your body as your movements grow unnaturally swift.
rush Rush
Your movement is no longer boosted.
You plunge yourself deeper into oblivion, enhancing your affinity towards the Architect.
Oblivion: Architect Channeling the Architect
With a substantial effort, you draw yourself free from the affinity towards the Architect.
At your direction, your swarm begins to divide and subdivide, the microscopic machines cannibalizing each other to build even smaller versions of themselves.
miniaturization Miniaturization
You no longer generate miniaturized nanites.
Your goggles flash as you instruct your swarm to protect you from incoming damage, and the cloud of microscopic machines that surrounds you seems to thicken slightly.
Your nanites are already protecting you from harm.
protect Protect
Your nanites cease protecting you from harm.

You direct your swarm to blanket the area and alert you of any activity. Millions of the microscopic machines billow out from your feet, settling like a clinging, static-laden dust upon every nearby surface.
alertness Alertness
Your nanites no longer report nearby movement to you.
You plunge yourself deeper into oblivion, enhancing your affinity towards the Conqueror.
Oblivion Affinity Improved affinity towards the Conqueror
With a substantial effort, you draw yourself free from the affinity towards the Conqueror.
You plunge yourself deeper into oblivion, enhancing your affinity towards the Traveller.
You have already formed affinity with the Traveller.
Oblivion Affinity Improved affinity towards the Traveller
You plunge yourself deeper into oblivion, enhancing your affinity towards the Progenitor.
You: Oblivion Speedup.
You can again speed up the passage of time.
You feel a rush of vitality as your stimjector releases healing nanites into your bloodstream.
You can again use a stimjector.
An aerodynamic drone buzzes around
Your bot can again harass someone.
You configure your stimjector to attempt to heal you automatically.
The stimjector will no longer heal you automatically.
^You build an instruction loop into .*'s programming, ordering it to repeatedly attempt to.* against .*\.$
^You can again order a repeated attack\.$
^Your bot ceases its attack, as its target is no longer present\.$
^A crane-armed carrybot stops its attack\.$
Your rage overwhelms you, you become unstoppable!
You no longer feel unstoppable!
The heart of distant stars and the fire at the center of every planet shimmers in your mind,
It is safe to suffuse yourself with kith energy again.
You focus your rage to become more resistant to damage.
You are less resistant.

Trigger.name: ttk1
Trigger.script: ttk_total = round(ct_duration / ct_kills, 2) ttk_bal = round(ct_balduration / ct_kills, 2) cecho("\n<ansi_yellow>TTK Total: <gray>"..ttk_total.."\n<ansi_yellow>TTK Balance: <gray>"..ttk_bal)

Trigger.name: ttk2
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == "Duration" then ct_duration = tonumber(matches[3]) elseif matches[2] == "BalanceUsed" then ct_balduration = tonumber(matches[3]) elseif matches[2] == "Kills" then ct_kills = tonumber(matches[3]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(Duration): (\d+)s
^(BalanceUsed): (\S+)s
^(Kills): (\d+)

TriggerGroup.name: ship
TriggerGroup.script: sym.ships = sym.ships or {} sym.ships.flags = sym.ships.flags or {}

Trigger.name: missile counter
Trigger.script: if not sym.space.flags.countermeasures and not sym.space.flags.missilesinbound then local firetime = matches[2] * .85 sym.space.flags.missilesinbound = true tempTimer( firetime, function() send('ship countermeasures') sym.space.flags.missilesinbound = false end ) end

Trigger.name: weapon autoassign module
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == "Interdictor Beam" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' iterdict') elseif matches[3] == "Laser Beam I" or matches[3] == "Laser Beam II" or matches[3] == "Laser Beam III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' lasers') elseif matches[3] == "Targeted Missile I" or matches[3] == "Targeted Missile II" or matches[3] == "Targeted Missile III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' missiles') elseif matches[3] == "Massive Cannon I" or matches[3] == "Massive Cannon II" or matches[3] == "Massive Cannon III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' mcannons') elseif matches[3] == "Cannon I" or matches[3] == "Cannon II" or matches[3] == "Cannon III" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' cannons') elseif matches[3] == "Slicekit" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' slicer') elseif matches[3] == "Cap Drainer" then send('ship module alias ' .. matches[2] .. ' drainer') else end

regexCodeList.string: ^Module #(\d+) - \b(.+)\b\s+(Active|Inactive)$

Trigger.name: backfire tracking
Trigger.script: if matches[3] ~= "No" and (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.ship_shield) > 0) then if not sym.space.restart then sym.space.restart = tempTimer(5, function() send("ship restart " .. matches[2]) sym.echo("Restarting " ..matches[2]) sym.space.restart = nil end) end end if matches[2] == "Engine" then engine_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Shield" then shield_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Capacitor" then capacitor_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Sensor" then sensor_bf = matches[3] elseif matches[2] == "Shipsim" then sim_bf = matches[3] else end

Trigger.name: ship balance
Trigger.script: if sym.space.boarded == true then deleteLine() else local vitals = gmcp.Char.Vitals local sym_ww = (vitals.ww == "1" and true or false) local efficacy = { "wetwiring_efficacy", "mind_efficacy", "muscular_efficacy", "internal_efficacy", "sensory_efficacy", } local systems = {"wetwiring", "mind", "muscular", "internal", "sensory"} if not sym_ww then return end for _, system in pairs(systems) do local value = math.floor(tonumber(vitals[system])) local evalue = tonumber(vitals[efficacy[_]]) if value <= 92.5 and evalue >= 85 then sym.echo('You should mend your ' .. system .. ' system') canmend = true break else canmend = false end end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Current Bounty: (.+)$
^A heap of rusty equipment indicates a JUNK shop here.$

Trigger.name: critical hits
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() local hit = matches[2] if hit == "CRITICAL" then cecho("
 <ansi_075>._.-._.-<white> CRITICAL HIT <ansi_075>-._.-._.") cecho('
 ') else cecho("
 <ansi_075><light_sea_green><medium_spring_green><light_sea_green>.<ansi_075>_<light_sea_green>.-<medium_spring_green>*<light_sea_green>-<white> CRUSHING CRITICAL HIT <light_sea_green>-<medium_spring_green>*<light_sea_green>-<ansi_075><light_sea_green>.<ansi_075>_<light_sea_green>.<medium_spring_green><light_sea_green><ansi_075>") cecho('
 ') end

regexCodeList.string: ^You have scored a (.+) hit\!
^A closed door is in the way\. You need to OPEN DOOR (.+) first\.$
^A door prevents you from dashing in that direction\.$
After meticulous and exacting labor, you finish polishing a faintly glowing Ta-Deth crystal, and it drops free into your hand, pulsing with a soft, internal glow.

Trigger.name: wilderness mapping on
Trigger.script: last_wilderness = gmcp.Room.Info.area expandAlias("map create on") expandAlias("area delete "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) expandAlias("rlc v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num.." 0 0 0") expandAlias("area add "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) expandAlias("room area "..gmcp.Room.Info.area)

regexCodeList.string: You enter the wilderness.

Trigger.name: wilderness mapping off
Trigger.script: expandAlias("map create on") expandAlias("area delete "..last_wilderness) expandAlias("map create off")

regexCodeList.string: You leave the wilderness.
With a cry of relief, you find the exit from the cache and dive out, evading your attackers.
Congratulations, you have advanced to the rank of
Denizen sale:
You have successfully primed the demolition charge here.
Ishvana No
Song No
Celestine No
Space junk selling
Scatterhome No
^Your amorphous restoratives soothe you\, regenerating .+ health\.$
7 Ishvana
Market sale.
Your drones return to their docking bay as they cannot find any more gas.
Task count:

Trigger.name: percent highlights (maybe)
Trigger.script:
local percents = (tonumber(matches[2]) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp)) * 100
if percents >= 92.5 then local red = 150 local green = 250 local blue = 100 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() elseif percents >= 70 then local red = 255 local green = 255 local blue = 0 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() elseif percents >= 30 then local red = 255 local green = 150 local blue = 20 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() else local red = 200 local green = 0 local blue = 0 selectString(matches[2], 1) setFgColor(red, green, blue) resetFormat() deselect() end echo(getTime(true, "mm:ss:z"))

Trigger.name: bug toggle
Trigger.script: --deleteLine() local toggle = matches[3] if toggle == "Yes" then cechoLink( "<cyan>" .. matches[2] .. " press <brown:white>me!", function() send('guile bug tuneout ' .. matches[2]) end, "On/Off", true ) else send('guile bug tunein ' .. matches[2]) end

Trigger.name: ambush follow
Trigger.script: local c = gmcp.Char.Status if c.name ~= matches[2] then sym.pvp.flags.ambushed = true tempTimer( 6, function() sym.pvp.flags.ambushed = false end ) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)\: Gun Ambush -> .+ \.
You lack the bullets to be able to do that.

Trigger.name: melter
Trigger.script: sym.pvp.flags.meltered = true tempTimer(20, function() sym.pvp.flags.meltered = false end)

regexCodeList.string: An acid-green metal canister explodes, spraying corrosive acid across

Trigger.name: track the tracks
Trigger.script: local target = matches[2] local direction = matches[3] if target == sym.target then send('walk ' ..direction) end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) .+ through here recently\, heading to the (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: trip
Trigger.script: sym.pvp.flags.trip = true tempTimer( 32, function() sym.pvp.flags.trip = false cecho("<orange> You can once again trip.") end )

regexCodeList.string: ^You: Guile Trip ->.+\.
^You can once again trip .+\.
You: Guile Bind
You are again ready to bind someone.

Hiding in the safety of your cover, you make a few quick and dirty modifications to a spiny shrapnel grenade to increase the radius of the explosion, activate the dangerously short detonation trigger, then huck it out into the open.

You make a few quick and dirty modifications to a handful of explosive putty that you're sure will increase the radius of the resulting explosion. Careless of harm to your own person, you prime the detonation sequence and toss the explosive forward.
You are again able to prime a room-wide explosive device.

You rearrange a few wires and circuitboards in a handful of explosive putty's detonator, a hair-raising sequence of modifications that makes the whole explosive more dangerous to handle. You hurl it away from you, though if you don't find cover, you will doubtless be caught in the ensuing blast.
You are again able to prime a mega explosive device.

Trigger.name: go to sleep
Trigger.script: sym.pvp.flags.sleep = true sym.pvp.flags.prone = true deleteLine() cecho('\n<green>Affliction: <goldenrod>SLEEEEEEP') tempTimer(30, function() sym.pvp.flags.sleep = false cecho('\n<orange>You can once again sleep this fool.') end)

regexCodeList.string: ^There is a faint buzzing noise\, and .+ lifts .+ neck, frowning in confusion before slowly toppling to the ground\, drugged to unconsciousness\.
^.+ is already on the ground\.
^You: Guile Trip -> .+\.
^.+ falls to the ground\!$
^(.+) stands up\.$
Empowered with celestial grace and swift reflexes

Trigger.name: tripbind
Trigger.script: if sym.target == matches[2] then send("guile bind " ..sym.target) end

regexCodeList.string: ^The mass of vines on the ground bursts into motion\, surging after (\w+).+ and pulling them back\,smashing them into the ground violently\.
^There is a faint buzzing noise\, and (\w+) .+ lifts a hand to .+ neck\,frowning in confusion before slowly toppling to the ground\, drugged to unconsciousness\.
^(\w+) falls to the ground!
^Looks like (.+) will be able to wriggle out of that bind in 8 seconds\.

Trigger.name: defup
Trigger.script: if sym.hunter.flags.architect == false then sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity architect') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization == false then sym.hunter.send('nano miniaturization') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect == false then sym.hunter.send('nano protect') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and sym.hunter.flags.rush == false then sym.hunter.send('nano rush') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and sym.hunter.flags.rush and sym.hunter.flags.alertness == false then sym.hunter.send('nano alertness') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and sym.hunter.flags.rush and sym.hunter.flags.alertness then sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity architect off') sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity conquerer') elseif sym.hunter.flags.architect == false and sym.hunter.flags.miniaturization and sym.hunter.flags.protect and sym.hunter.flags.rush and sym.hunter.flags.alertness and sym.hunter.flags.conqueror then sym.hunter.send('oblivion affinity traveller') else sym.hunter.send('oblivion channel progenitor') echo('<yellow> DEFUP COMPLETE - DONT FORGET PROGENITOR') end

regexCodeList.string: Defense Info.

Trigger.name: nanoCover
Trigger.script: if currentcover == matches[2] then echo('cover matched') elseif not incover then send('take cover ' .. matches[2]) currentcover = matches[2] else -- send('void propgrab ' .. matches[2]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^They have taken cover behind .+\(\#(\d+)\)\.
^A rapidly scrolling alert is projected across the lenses of your goggles as your swarm reports .+ to the .+\.$
^The alert status of your swarm shifts to a different subroutine\, changing the readout across your goggles to suggest that .+ is no longer present to the .+\.
^An alarm flashes across the HUD of your goggles\, your swarm sending you an urgent signal that .+ is currently triggering their proximity alert subroutines\.$
Your nanites can not swap any more afflictions, because they are all present already.
Your renown in the hacking community
You: Nanotech Mindswap
^The group of nanites ceases disrupting .+ mind\.$
^(\w+): Void Roomdrain\.$
You can again drain a room.
You: Nanotech Delay Prep
You already have an ongoing delayed attack.
You: Nanotech Delay -

Trigger.name: distraction
Trigger.script: sym.pvp.flags.distracted = true tempTimer(4, function() sym.pvp.flags.distracted = false end)

regexCodeList.string: ^You: Nanotech Mindswap (\w+) -> Distraction -> (.+)\.$
You: Nanotech Distract
You: Nanotech Mindswap Distraction
You: Nanotech Sluggish Fail
You: Nanotech Distract Fail
You: Nanotech Sluggish ->
^Unfortunately, .+ retains too much strength for your attack to succeed\.$
You: Nanotech Mindswap Sluggish
You: Nanotech Sluggish Fail
You: Void Rattle

Trigger.name: rattle cooldown
Trigger.script: selectCurrentLine() setFgColor(0,170,255) resetFormat() deselect() sym.pvp.flags.rattle = false sym.pvp.flags.sluggish = false sym.pvp.flags.distracted = false sym.pvp.flags.mindaff = 0

regexCodeList.string: ^.+'s wetwiring is once again susceptible to rattling\.$
^Unfortunately\, .+ retains too much strength for your attack to succeed\.
^.+ mind is not plagued by enough maladies\.$
^You discern that the nanites have delivered (\w+)\, bringing the mind affliction total to (\d+)\.$
^Your nanites report that .+ wetwiring has cured a mind affliction\.$
You: Void Minddrain

Trigger.name: nano affinity
Trigger.script: sym.pvp.flags.affinitied = true local affinityfalloff = multimatches[2][2] tempTimer( affinityfalloff, function() sym.pvp.flags.affinitied = false end )

regexCodeList.string: You: Nanotech Affinity
^The effect will last for (\d+) seconds\.$
You: Nanotech Envelop
You send your nanites to envelop

Trigger.name: assess highlights
Trigger.script: deleteLine() local tblname = string.split(gmcp.Char.Status.target, " ") local target = tblname[1] local dir = table.keys(gmcp.Room.Info.exits) c = "white" if matches[3] == "healthy" then cecho('\nTarget: <' .. c .. '>' .. target .. ' ' .. matches[3]:gsub(' ', ' #').. ' ' ..gmcp.IRE.Target.Info.hpperc) elseif matches[3] == "wounded" then cecho('\nTarget: <' .. c .. '>' .. target .. ' ' .. matches[3]:gsub(' ', ' #').. ' ' ..gmcp.IRE.Target.Info.hpperc) elseif matches[3] == "maimed" then cecho('\nTarget: <' .. c .. '>' .. target .. ' ' .. matches[3]:gsub(' ', ' #').. ' ' ..gmcp.IRE.Target.Info.hpperc) elseif matches[3] == "critically wounded" then cecho('\nTarget: <' .. c .. '>' .. target .. ' ' .. matches[3]:gsub(' ', ' ').. ' ' ..gmcp.IRE.Target.Info.hpperc) if sym.pvp.flags.unstoppable and not sym.checkmodule('Hunting') then send('rage throw '.. sym.target .. ' ' .. dir[1]) end else cecho('\nTarget: <' .. c .. '>' .. target .. ' ' .. matches[3]:gsub(' ', ' #').. ' ' ..gmcp.IRE.Target.Info.hpperc) if sym.pvp.flags.unstoppable and not sym.checkmodule('Hunting') then send('rage throw '.. sym.target .. ' ' .. dir[1]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You assess (.+)'s health and see that they are (healthy|wounded|maimed|critically wounded|dead)\.$

Trigger.name: location following

Trigger.name: damage dealt track
Trigger.script: deleteLine() cecho("\nDamage Dealt: "..matches[2].. " " ..matches[3].." - "..matches[4]) if matches[3] == "electric" then sym.pvp.currentstatic = sym.pvp.currentstatic + (matches[2] * .1) cecho('\n ') cecho('\n Current Static: '..sym.pvp.currentstatic) cecho('\n ') end

regexCodeList.string: ^Damage Dealt: (\d+) (.+), (.+)

Trigger.name: targetting highlight
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() cecho("
<orange>Targetting: <white><<green>"..matches[2].."<white>>") target = matches[2] local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class if class == "Nanoseer" then sym.pvp.flags.rattle = false sym.pvp.flags.sluggish = false sym.pvp.flags.distracted = false sym.pvp.flags.mindaff = 0 elseif class == "Engineer" then sym.pvp.currentstatic = 0 sym.pvp.currentshards = 0 enableTimer('static') sym.pvp.flags.worming = false cecho('
 ') cecho('
<ansi_light_cyan> Current Static: '..current_static) cecho('
<ansi_light_red> Current Shards: '..current_shards) cecho('
 ') else end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your target is now\: (.+) \(.+\)$
